883140.name: VEGAS Pro 16 Edit Steam Edition
883140.description:
VEGAS Pro 16 Edit – Steam Edition enables faster, more efficient editing for your videos. Edit videos faster than ever before with the new, one-of-a-kind dynamic storyboard workflow: Automatically delete unwanted black borders from your project, add subtitles from a file and import all your videos into the Timeline with a single click. Thanks to GPU acceleration, render your videos in record time and finish even complex projects faster – so you're at the top of your game when it comes to video editing, too.

Highlights

Essential functions in VEGAS Pro 16 Edit – Steam Edition:
  • Dynamic interaction between storyboard & timeline modes
  • Professional audio plug-ins
  • Intuitive drag and drop workflow
  • Restore deleted audio or video tracks with a click
  • Automatically delete black frames clips
  • Automatic creation of subtitles from files
  • Improved High DPI scaling
  • Hardware acceleration
  • Comprehensive backup options
  • Included: Bézier Masking OFX plug-in

Video and audio production


Innovative editing tools
Edit your gameplays natively in resolutions of up to 4K using drag-and-drop functionality.
VEGAS Pro 16 Edit provides a fully customizable workspace and an impressive array of innovative tools and thoughtful touches. Edit an exhilarating gameplay video or Let's Plays fast, add amazing video and audio effects, then upload it directly to your channel to share experiences with your followers.
Use the Bézier masking OFX plug-in to quickly and easily create rectangular and oval-shaped masks which isolate or mask out portions of your gameplays.

Complete creative freedom

VEGAS Pro 16 Edit – Steam Edition offers a fully configurable user interface, allowing you to set up your own unique work space for ultimate flexibility and maximum efficiency. Focus fully on your creative process and present your most ambitious gameplays in a format to match.
883140.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
